comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The writing on the negative looks to be "BECIC" not "BEDIC" to me. There is a Becic in Montenegro and another in Serbia (using today's boundaries). See www.fallingrain.com/world/YI/a/B/e/c/ There was also a General Becic in the Montenegrin army. See militaryhistory.suite101.com/article.cfm/the_1914_army_of...
